About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment only. Reference assistance available in person and by mail. Copying for books/journals, photographs and newspapers available. Referral to paid researchers is available.

About.Access: Minimum age 18 years. Write for appointment allowing 14 days for approval by Dean. Closed period of 30 years applies to most records.

About.Major holdings: Diocesan Synod, Archbishop in Council, Archbishops, Registrars: Letter books, minutes, correspondence, articles, Synod legislation, Diocesan newspapers 1847-1991.
